title: Driverless Cars Pose New Legal Hurdles (Audio)
itunes:title: Driverless Cars Pose New Legal Hurdles (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Erik Gordon, a professor at the University of Michigan University Ross School of Business, discusses the legal challenges posed by driverless cars. He speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
